attributes.action: seek an assurance from his counterpart in Portugal that the circumstances surrounding confidential police information relating to an ongoing enquiry appearing in the Portuguese press be fully and thoroughly investigated to establish whether Portuguese Law has been broken, and if so to bring the perpetrators to justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
